```{r}
files <- list.files("March Madness Regular Season Data", pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = TRUE)


regular_season_df <- files |>
  lapply(function(f) read_csv(f, col_types = cols(.default = "c"))) |>
  bind_rows()
```
